description:
Timeless cardigan lines brought to life with high-tech materials and construction. Acr’teryx’s Covert line offers slick looking outwear that is at home on hut-trips or trips to the corner store. Crafted from a warm heathered fleece, it's a great choice for cool fall days and layers well when the weather turns truly nasty.

  • Uses Arc’teryx’s Alpenex II™ heathered fleece, a lightweight and breathable fleece that wears well and packs well
  • Stealthy underarm gussets allow and improved range of movement while keeping with the top’s clean lines
  • Hand and sleeve pockets give you a secure place to stash necessities
  • Pockets are laminated with glued in zippers, improving strength and adding durability
  • Bound cuffs and hemline eliminate the risk of fraying
  • Regular fit wears like you want it to, no surprises
name: Arc'teryx Covert Cardigan - Women's
